001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.pojo;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonIgnoreProperties;
004import org.bitcoinj.base.Sha256Hash;
005
006/**
007 * Data class for Outpoint as used by RPC methods
008 */
009public class Outpoint {
010    private final Sha256Hash txid;
011    private final int        vout;
012
013    public Outpoint(Sha256Hash txid, int vout) {
014        this.txid = txid;
015        this.vout = vout;
016    }
017
018    public Sha256Hash getTxid() {
019        return txid;
020    }
021
022    public int getVout() {
023        return vout;
024    }
025
026    public String toString() {
027        return "{ " + txid + ", " + vout + " }";
028    }
029}
